src:
難忘雨中4P大戰　美子點評台灣男生也很色
06 Nov 2019, 04:58 by 溫雅雯
「長腿甜美慾女」美子因為想當攝影會的模特兒，陰錯陽差地成為了AV女優，還以「痴女」形象與另一名女優楓彩被稱為「痴女姐妹花」。經歷8年AV生涯後，美子於去年宣布退役，目前以平面攝影工作與攝影會進行活動，並接受JKF雜誌邀請，擔任11月封面女郎。
美子以藝名「桐山凜果」出道，也曾使用「小峰美子」的名字，最難忘曾經在豪雨中的戶外拍攝4P畫面，還曾因為「劇情需要」，跑去日曬將自己曬成黑辣妹。美子自認屁股是全身上下最有魅力的部位，為雜誌拍照時，穿上性感鮮豔紅色內衣曬E罩杯上圍，搭配讓許多男性無法抵抗的黑色網襪，動用3個人才將費工的網襪搞定。


美子覺得自己的屁股非常有魅力，大方展現。（JKF提供）

已經4度來台的美子，對台灣的珍珠奶茶情有獨鍾，「一開始在日本喝到時覺得不怎麼樣，不過來到台灣喝了道地口味後，從此愛上了！這次還吃到熱炒店的粉條蒸蝦，真的好好吃。」她去年曾來台參加TRE台北國際成人展，對台灣粉絲印象深刻，「台灣男生雖然也很好色，不過很紳士呢。」美子透露自己喜歡「會一直親我的男生」，討厭裝模作樣又輕浮的類型，而對於床笫之事，最喜歡的體位是「騎乘位」。


問美子是否有機會復出AV界，她語帶保留。（JKF提供）

第一次登上JKF雜誌封面，美子拍攝時緊張而顯得肢體僵硬，不過個性樂天又傻大姊的她，在換上外放而誘人的網襪造型後，自然地擺出撩人又性感的動作；聊對於復出？美子並沒有把話說死，表示「目前的階段對於自己的心態還不太明確了解，希望真的喜歡我的台灣粉絲能夠再等等」。
更新時間｜2019.11.06 04:56
text:
Unforgettable 4P World War in the rain
06 Nov 2019, 04:58 by Wen Yawen
"Long legs, sweet and beautiful woman", because she wants to be a model of the photography society, she became an AV actress in the wrong way. She is also known as the "female girl sister flower" with the image of "the girl" and another actress. After eight years of AV career, Miko announced his retirement last year. He is currently working on a photojournalism and photography event, and is invited by JKF Magazine to serve as the cover girl in November.
Meizi debuted with the stage name "Tongshan Yuguo" and used the name of "Xiaofeng Meizi". The most memorable outdoor shooting 4P picture in the torrential rain, and because of the "drama needs", went to the sun to make himself tan. Hot girl. Miko recognizes her ass as the most attractive part of her body. When she takes photos for the magazine, she wears a bright red underwear and a cup of E-cup. It is equipped with black net stockings that many men can’t resist. It takes 3 people to work on the net stockings. Get it done.


Miko feels that her ass is very attractive and generous. (provided by JKF)

Miko, who has come to Taiwan for 4 degrees, has a special liking for Taiwan's pearl milk tea. "I didn't feel very good when I first started drinking in Japan. But after I came to Taiwan to drink the taste of the land, I fell in love with it! This time I still eat. The steamed shrimps in the hot-selling shop are really delicious." She came to Taiwan to attend the TRE Taipei International Adult Show last year and was very impressed by the Taiwanese fans. "Taiwanese boys are also very good, but very gentlemen." I like the "boys who will always kiss me", hate the type of frivolous and frivolous, and for the bed, the favorite position is "riding position."


Asked if Miko had the opportunity to come back to the AV world, she was reserved. (provided by JKF)

The first time I boarded the cover of JKF magazine, Miko was nervous and stiff when she was shooting, but her personality was so stupid, she was naturally sultry and sexy after putting on a seductive net stocking. Action; chat for comeback? Miko did not say anything to death, saying that "the current stage is not very clear about his mentality. I hope that my Taiwanese fans can wait for me."
Update time|2019.11.06 04:56
